pre_caption: This is a static, scenic shot from the deck of a container ship at the Port of Savannah, Georgia. A massive ship-to-shore crane looms over the vessel, which is laden with colorful shipping containers. The view is captured on a rainy, overcast day, with water droplets on the lens obscuring the industrial port and waterway in the background.
